title: Form spacing: Horisontal
code:
<gds-flex width="100%" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" padding="4xl">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="row" padding="m" gap="m">
    <gds-flex align-items="flex-start" gap="xl">
      <gds-datepicker dateformat="d/m/y" label="From" width=180px"></gds-datepicker>
      <gds-datepicker label="To" dateformat="d/m/y" width=180px"></gds-datepicker>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex>
    <gds-badge variant="notice">XL (24)
      <gds-icon-square-placeholder slot="lead" solid="true"></gds-icon-square-placeholder>
    </gds-badge>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>
